content.description: An aesthetic line that climbs almost as good as it looks. Sit start and get the first hard move off of the deck and then traverse the jugs right to a couple of tough deadpoints. Top out on really good holds. The sitstart is supposedly V6 (I felt it was very soft), and the standstart is V3. I think the stand is hard for V3.
content.protection: A couple of pads, and a spotter on top of the rock on the other side of the corridor.
content.location: When you get to the corridor this is the obvious boulder problem up the middle of the rock making up the right side of the corridor.

content.description: An obvious corridor that you reach via the main trail. There are several easy problems and warm-ups at these boulders, with a few moderates as well.
